name: Battle Bound (ironkid1212)
description:
⊂ Battle Bound ⊃

I am proud to introduce Battle Bound! The most advanced project I've ever made!

⚠️Please read⚠️

⊳Go to settings to see the movement controls

IF THE LOADOUT POINTS TURN YELLOW, YOU CANT HAVE THAT LOADOUT AND IT'LL RESET INGAME

The cloud variables might lag sometimes, and that can cause:

⊳Bullets not taking damage

⊳Players look like they're teleporting

⊳Players freezing

⊳You get thrown in and out of the server

The game may also not run smooth on slow computers*

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

◢ Information ◣

All of the information is inside the project!

I recommend reading "Introduction" in the intro, and "About" in the menu to understand the game more.

Movement controls are customizable under "Settings"

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

◢ Credits ◣

Big thank you to @XShrunk for the multiplayer engine, testing and a few ideas!

Thanks to @griffpatch for the platform code.

Shotgun sound from Epic Games.

Shuriken sound from @Will_Wam's Ninja 5.

Gun sounds from youtube library.

Some SFX sounds from Scratch library.

Some hat designs inspired by... among us :|

Mandalorian helmet from Disney's Mandalorian series. (vector made by me)

The rest is made by me, @KIKOKO_

Thanks to these people for testing: @TimMcCool @XShrunk @iDuoof @Carot3 @I8D @INorth @missyq @spazestudios @squarelemonstudios

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Please ❤️️ & ⭐ if you like this! I appreciate it :D

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
